DIA_Astol_HELLO_03_01: Hello, you must be tired after all that gold mining.
DIA_Astol_HELLO_03_02: Lie down for a while on one of those comfy sheepskin beds and get some rest. You'll regain your strength and be ready to move on.
DIA_Astol_HELLO_Yes_15_01: Thanks, sleep will do me some good.
DIA_Astol_AfterSleep_15_04: You didn't say I'd have to pay to sleep!
DIA_Astol_AfterSleep_03_05: I think it's obvious. Are you paying, or do I have to get it out of you myself?
DIA_Astol_AfterSleep_03_06: Sleepy? You didn't forget the 7 nuggets for the service, did you?
DIA_Astol_AfterSleep_Pay_03_02: Smart boy. If you need another short nap, you know where to find me.
DIA_Astol_AfterFight_03_02: Thank you for using our services and please come back.
DIA_Astol_AfterFight_03_01: Keep the nuggets. Get out of my sight!
